content: labubu crochet socks pattern by moonyxsarah for personal use only you are not allowed to sell or distribute this pattern or a changes version of it this is a simple beginner friendly pattern to help you crochet a pair of socks for your labubu it s just a base pattern so feel free to add things like little bows or other things to your labubu s socks to make them fit your personal style i used light fingering/ weight 1 sock yarn but any weight 1 yarn will do moonyxsarah in this pattern i used hobbii s rainbow sock wool 4-ply in the color 29 material & gauge light fingering/ weight 1 yarn or 6hdc = 2cm yarn to obtain gauge for my gauge swatch i chained 12 2 0mm crochet hook or hook to and then worked half_double_crochet from the 2nd obtain gauge chain from the hook until end ch2 turn and again half_double_crochet until end scissor tapestry needle labubu feet 2 5cm in length stitch marker to mark beginning of measured from heel to toe round optional abbreviation chain chain st s stitch es single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase increase bl back loop pattern round 1 1 chain 6 2 into 2nd chain from the hook half_double_crochet into each chain until one chain remains 3 4 half_double_crochet into last chain you llnow start to crochet into the otherside of the chain 4 half_double_crochet into the remaining chains moonyxsarah 5 3 half_double_crochet into last chain where the first half_double_crochet is placed turningthe chain pattern round 2 6 increase in the half_double_crochet 7 half_double_crochet until you reach the heel see step 3 half_double_crochet into the first of the 4 half_double_crochet increase in the next 2 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet into the fourth half_double_crochet 8 half_double_crochet until you reach the beginning of the round increase note at this point you increased at the tip and at the heel of the sole of the sock the sock should have an oval shape and cover your labubu s foot moonyxsarah pattern round 3 + finishing moonyxsarah 9 half_double_crochet bl into every st 10 single_crochet into every st until you reach desired length i didthree rounds yoursock shouldlooksomethinglike this step9 cut the yarn and weave in the end moonyxsarah all done
